Text: You sure this is BDRip? Judging by the screens, it looks like a Cam version!!!!! Plus. how in the hell did you get a movie compressed down to only 379.71 MB?

How in the hell did you get a Blue Ray rip down to less than 400MB? I am dying to know, really! Judging by the screens it looks like crap, no offense so I was assuming either half the movie is missing or you compressed to the lowest quality available. Just asking.
It is the full movie nothing missing.
